summary.span: 启用数据绑定控件容器来为简化的数据绑定操作标识数据项对象。

span.span: Enables data-bound control containers to identify a data item object for simplified data-binding operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容器的类实现接口可以将指定的属性用于标识数据绑定操作，如使用后期绑定的数据项目类。Container classes that implement the interface can specify which of their properties identifies the data item for data-binding operations, such as late binding with the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用接口。The following code example demonstrates how to use the interface. `SimpleSpreadsheetControl`是一个控件，将显示类似于数据表格样式或控件。The `SimpleSpreadsheetControl` is a control that displays tabular-style data, similar to a or control. 它包含的一组`SimpleSpreadsheetRow`对象。It contains a set of `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` objects. `SimpleSpreadsheetRow`类是实现的容器类接口。The `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` class is a container class that implements the interface. 尽管在此示例中直观地为数据项属性，但`Data`，则可以实现属性将映射到方法的任何属性或返回值。Although in this example the data item property is intuitively named `Data`, the property can be implemented to map to any property or return value of a method.
